page.title: 10Education In Our Area
page.content: { { hool}you have to be 4 years old.In these days everyone has to go to school.It is the law that children must go to school or your parents will have to go to court. In class 1 which is for the 4 and 5 year olds,they do drawing,painting early maths and learn to read and write.When you get to classes 2,3,4,5 they teach you more and you spend a year in each class.We go to school on Mon.Tues.Wed.Thurs.Frid.We have visitors who help us learn,like experts who teach art,make toys or write books.At school we are doing the Domesday Project which is great.When you are 11 you go to{Secondary school for 5 years.You can choose{Redruth {Pool or Camborne Comprehensive.}When you are 16 you can go to{Technical {college }or get a job.
